title: Clams, crab, chorizo and chilli
description: A fabulous seafood platter with deep-fried soft shell crab, grilled razor clams and clams cooked white wine.
ingredients: 125ml/4fl oz white wine or oloroso sherry
2 chorizo sausages, cut into strips lengthways
2 soft shell crabs, cut in half giving 4 pieces
handful fresh basil leaves, to serve
